title: Warwick Visual Update?
body:
I think Warwick needs a visual update. Compared to his feline counterpart, Rengar, he doesn't look nearly as badass.

Warwick looks kind of generic/goofy to me, and he's got kind of a lumbering run animation. Not very ferocious. Other than his model looking like a wolf, I don't see much else about him that's wolf-like.  Here's a few changes I think would be cool:

- A model that has a bit more character and nuance (like Rengar).
- A more ferocious looking gait.
- When he gets a movement speed boost from Blood Scent, he starts running on all 4's.
- For his ult, instead of him just blandly teleporting above his target's head, if he instead had some kind of wolf-shadow-like pounce animation flash toward his toward target simultaneously (without adding a delay to the teleport itself).
